short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Registers the profile images of all users in Slack team as custom emojis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uemoji registers the profile images of all users in Slack team as custom emojis.

The setup is completed in the following 3 steps:
1. Add Uemoji to Chrome.
2. Click the Uemoji icon.
3. Select the Slack team.

Features:
- Automatically process once a day.
- Add a custom emoji for your user name.
- Set the display name of the user profile as an alias for the registered custom emoji.
